channel.title: Benewah County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Benewah County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: WA-274 - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-274 west.

item.title: Leaving Coeur d'Alene Indian Reservation
item.description: Leaving the Coeur d’Alene Indian Reservation on ID-60 west at the Idaho-Washington State Line.

item.title: End ID-60
item.description: End ID-60 West at Washington State Line

item.title: US-95 South at ID-60 West
item.description: US-95 south at ID-60 West to Tekoa (Washington).

item.title: US-95 South at ID-60 West
item.description: US-95 south at ID-60 West

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-60
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-60

item.title: ID-3 north at ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north at ID-6. The White Pine Scenic Byway follows ID-3 north from here to Rose Lake.

item.title: ID-3 North Approaching ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north approaching ID-6. Use ID-6 west for Potlatch. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: St. Joe River Scenic Byway
item.description: St. Joe River Scenic Byway on St. Joe River Road east.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-5 East
item.description: US-95 south to Moscow and Lewiston at ID-5 east to St. Maries and Heyburn State Park.

item.title: End ID-60 East at US-95
item.description: End ID-60 east at US-95 north to Plummer/Coeur d’Alene, and south to Moscow.

item.title: End ID-60 East at US-95
item.description: End ID-60 east at US-95.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-5 East
item.description: US-95 north at ID-5 east to St. Maries. Continue north on US-95 for Coeur d’Alene and Spokane (Washington).

item.title: US-95 North approaching ID-60
item.description: US-95 north at ID-60 west to Tekoa (Washington). Continue north on US-95 for Plummer and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-60
item.description: US-95 north at ID-60 in Benewah County.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-5
item.description: ID-5 junction on ID-3 south.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-5
item.description: ID-3 south to Bovill and Potlatch at ID-5 west to Plummer.

item.title: End ID-6 East at ID-3
item.description: End ID-6 east at ID-3. The brown shields indicate a state scenic byway, in this case White Pine Scenic Byway. The White Pine Scenic Byway turns north on ID-3 here.

item.title: End ID-6 East at ID-3
item.description: End ID-6 east at ID-3. Continue straight for ID-3 south to Clarkia; turn left for ID-3 north to St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-6 South - White Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-6 South, the White Pine Scenic Byway near Santa in Benewah County.
